articles.title: One per cent of Ontario's population had recovered from COVID-19 by June 30: study - CP24 Toronto's Breaking News
articles.description: Slightly more than one per cent of Ontarians – roughly 160,000 people – were infected and had recovered from the novel coronavirus by the end of June, Public Health Ontario says after conducting tests on thousands of blood samples.
